author: sky.cactus
content:
Does anyone know of a list of sites on the internet that publish the latest Ethereum blockhash or most recent final blockhash?

In order to interact with Ethereum tustressly, one needs an anchor to prove against.  The simplest anchor would be a recent blockhash, and I'm looking for a large set of places that will freely give out the latest blockhash via HTTP API.

Alternatively, does anyone know of any extremely light clients that can follow the latest blockhash via libp2p?  They wouldn't provide or ask for any other data, just trying to follow head blockhash in a trust-minimized/decentralized way.

content: Trustless anchor or extremely light client
